top_comment.text:
The first episode of #MagruderMobile  is here! I drove to the University of 
Central Florida to ask students about the friend zone and got some 
interesting responses! 

The goal is to integrate these videos with my blog that I'm working on 
settings up. In the blog I'll talk about what I liked/disliked about the 
university.

I also have a behind the scenes video coming out on Sunday, so be on the 
lookout!﻿
top_comment.author: ScooterMagruder

comments.text: Great video, would you consider coming to Seminole State College?

comments.author: Christian Pelaez-Espinosa

captions.text: What’s up guys, hope you’re doing well.

I’m Scooter Magruder and this is Magruder
Mobile and today we drove all the way to the

University of Central Florida to find out
more about the friend zone.

♫♫ Right around the way from Roscoe’s
pollo. That’s Roscoe’s...
Today I’m here with:

Michael
Tevin

Jordan
Natasha

I’m Morgan
Mitchell

Marissa
Bea

And we are talking about the friend zone,
but before we get started on that…how do
you like going to UCF?

I love it. Best school in the nation.
Parking is pretty awful.

Ahh, so far can’t complain. It’s pretty
good.

What do you like about being a UCF Knight?
Everything. It’s a lot better than being

a Florida Gator.
Wow.

I love it even though it’s the biggest school,
I think I fit right in and I love the people
around here.
I heard, you know, Gainesville is pretty boring.

I got a full ride to UF and chose UCF over
UF because I…
STOP!

Rate the girls, 1 being Rosie O'Donnell.
I would give the majority an 8.

9.266
Above average I would say.

How are the guys at UCF?
The guys are good.

10 being Scooter Magruder, 1 being Flavor
Flav what are the guys?

Ooh, I mean nothing compares to you so I have
to give them a 9.

If you could change one thing about UCF, what
would it be Natasha?

Ooh, how much money it is.
I’d pick it up and move it next to the beach.

A lot of people commute here and a lot of
people just go home after the weekend.

So a lot of people don’t…
Yeah, on the weekends it’s empty, it’s

like this.
And I’ve seen FSU and FSU’s got it going
on.

Well we party. I heard FSU’s kind of nasty,
so it’s like a different kind of party.
We’re a classier kind of party.

But Bea, the real reason we came here today
is because we wanted to find out more about
the friend zone.
Friend zone, the friend zone, the friend zone.

What is the friend zone?
The friend zone is basically when a guy puts

himself into a position where he becomes completely
un-dateable.

You’re interested in a girl and you’re
like “Wow I really like here!”

Where you put a guy you are not interested
in.

And all of the sudden you’re talking to
her and she just drops “Oh yeah, I have
a boyfriend.”

The friend zone is a black hole that you cannot
get out of.

You sound like you’ve been there before.
I have not been in the friend zone, but I’ve
witnessed it.

Oh my God, you’re like a big brother to
me.

They’re just stuck in that zone of just
“you’re just a friend to me.”

Now Doug, can I call you Doug?
You can call me Doug.

What is the friend zone?
I don’t know.

Have you been friend zoned before?
Once, in high school.

I would say so. There’s like this one girl
I was interested in and of course I got the
infamous “Oh you’re such a great friend.”

Tell us about this experience. What happened?
You seem a little bit broken up about it.
What…what happened?

I was too much of a friend to her like her
best friend and everything…

So like you watched the Notebook is what you’re
saying?

No we did not actually watch…
How many times did you watch the Notebook

with her?
Maybe once.

How many guys have you put into the friend
zone? Do not lie Natasha.
Umm, I’ve had my few.

I’ve had to impose the friend zone on a
guy, but usually…you know a guy will do
it to himself.

Honestly, none cause I’ve been with this
guy for 3 years so…

Oh 3 years! Now did he start off in the friend
zone?

Well, yeah obviously cause you don’t know
each other that much.

Obviously?
I was not in the friend zone.

Let’s say you put a guy in the friend zone.
How does he get out of the friend zone? Is
it even possible Bea?
Umm, yeah of course it is.

I don’t really think there is a way to get
out of it.

Man up. Man up and just talk to her and be
like “This is not where I want to be.”

They say that the best relationships grow
from friendships…so

It’s not.
It’s not possible?
I’ve never seen it happen.

Take me out to a really nice date and let
me know that you want to get out of the zone
cause maybe I don’t know.

If you’re the shoulder to cry on, I’m
not going to want to sleep with you.

You can always go through a massive hoax of
how you died and then you come back to life.

And then she realizes that she truly does
have feelings for you.

So what you’re saying, you’re suggesting
a Catfish situation Manti Te’oesque?
Yes.

Throw out a name.
Gladyvette.

Alright, so you say Gladyvette:
Gladyvette I know we’re really good friends

and I have feelings for you that’s more
than just friends and I’d like to take it
to another level.

There’s always a way to get out of the friend
zone.

Do you know anyone who’s gotten out of the
friend zone?
No…

What is it like being a redhead?
Umm, being a redhead is great. Thank you for

calling me a redhead and not a ginger by the
way. I appreciate that. There’s a distinction.

There is a distinction. Gingers do not have
souls.

Did you hear that? That means you’ve been
chosen to represent your university in the
academic challenge.
What state or states border Florida?

Louisiana.
Mississippi.

Alabama.
and Georgia?

Are you single?
I am single.

Who was the second president of the United
States of America?
I want to say John Adams, but I don’t know.

In H2O, what does the 2 stand for?
One component of oxygen and two components
of hydrogen.

What is the absolute value of 9?
Absolute value…3?

Which team one the Super Bowl in 2011?
Patriots.

That’s all the time we have for today. As
always subscribe if you’re new and don’t
forget:
Press the like button.
New videos every Sunday. No Jugamos Juegos.
Throw me the alley.
Go Knights. Go Knights! Woooo!
I’m a grown man.

title: The Friend Zone - University of Central Florida
